titles: Old English blood boyling afresh in Leicestershire men: occasioned by the late barbarous invasion of the Scots. As appears by this letter from my Lord Grey, to Major Generall Skippon.
author: Groby, Thomas Grey, Baron of, 1623?-1657.
publisher: Printed by H. for Giles Calvert, at the black spread-eagle, at the West end of Pauls,
notes: Identified as Wing S5190 on UMI Microfilm Early English books reel 1671.
Reproductions of originals in the University of Illinois Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason tracts).
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
